description: This charming restaurant right in the town centre boasts colourful decor and a lively, relaxed atmosphere. Fish and seafood from the nearby Mediterranean are served in imaginative dishes full of character, including highly recommended raw dishes and the popular “caciucco” (Tuscan fish stew).
